sentences.en: a harbour on the leeward side of the island
sentences.cn: 位于岛的背风面的海港

sentences.en: Accusations of harbouring suspects were raised against the former Hungarian leadership.
sentences.cn: 匈牙利前领导人被指控窝藏疑犯。

sentences.en: as they sailed into Portsmouth Harbour
sentences.cn: 当他们驶入朴次茅斯港的时候

sentences.en: Chelsea Harbour is renowned for its fashionable restaurants.
sentences.cn: 切尔西港以高档餐馆闻名。

sentences.en: For three days, it was inadvisable to leave the harbour.
sentences.cn: 三天之内最好不要驶离海港。

sentences.en: From his position on the cliff top, he had a good view of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 他在悬崖之巅，海港景色一览无余。

sentences.en: Green and yellow lights blinked on the surface of the harbour.
sentences.cn: 海港的水面上闪烁着绿色和黄色的灯光。

sentences.en: He steered the boat into the harbour.
I think he’s harbouring some sort of grudge against me.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他对我有点怀恨在心。

sentences.en: I waved goodbye and went down the stone harbour steps.
sentences.cn: 我挥手告别，然后走下港口石阶。

sentences.en: Sewage nutrients do increase algal growth in the harbour.
sentences.cn: 污水中的营养物确实会加快港口的海藻生长。

sentences.en: Sinks and draining boards can harbour germs.
sentences.cn: 洗涤槽和沥水板可能藏有病菌。

sentences.en: The fishing boat harbour was usually bustling with lots of local colour.
sentences.cn: 该渔港通常都是一派热闹繁忙的景象，很有地方色彩。

sentences.en: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.cn: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

sentences.en: The old harbour is still full of atmosphere and well worth visiting.
sentences.cn: 这座古老的港口依然充满了情趣，颇值得一游。

sentences.en: The ship was permitted to tie up in Bos-ton harbour.
sentences.cn: 该船获准在波士顿港口停泊。

sentences.en: They're dredging the harbour so that larger ships can use it.
sentences.cn: 他们正在疏浚港湾以便大船驶入。

sentences.en: Tiny boats bobbed up and down in the harbour.

words.tran_cn: 居住，生存；入港停泊；躲藏

phrases.tran_cn: 海港城（地名，位于香港尖沙咀）
港湾工程，港口工程；海港工程

trans.tran_en: an area of water next to the land where the water is calm, so that ships are safe when they are inside it
to protect and hide criminals that the police are searching for
to keep bad thoughts, fears, or hopes in your mind for a long time
